ygData.subject: Re: Our class
ygData.msgSnippet: Greg my friend at early levels till about 20 we are the most wussy class around but alas it all changes from there~!!!! we get some spells around level 20 that
ygData.messageBody:
Greg my friend at early levels till about 20 we are the most wussy class around
but alas it all changes from there~!!!! we get some spells around level 20 that
can do like 200+ damage also i had a level 50 wiz friend (p3 beta had a gm boost
him) and the wizards best spell at level 49 does a whoooping 1100 damage heres a
little about Ice Comet
Ice comet is a cold based direct damage spell which delivers an obscene amount of
damage. This is the most powerful spell currently in
the game delivering over 1100 points of damage.

No other class can do that much damage in 1 hit :) so stick in there and you will
soon find why we are masters of the realm!
Thorn
